core: morning joint stiffness with cracking sensation
aching knees worse in damp cold weather
lower-back pain relieved by slow continued movement but worse after inactivity
swollen and tender finger joints with reduced grip strength
shifting joint pains from knees to ankles
heaviness in limbs especially in the evening
difficulty concentrating when joint stiffness increases
mental fatigue disproportionate to physical activity
restlessness when pain worsens at night
fatigue that increases after exposure to cold wind
sluggishness on waking despite adequate sleep
symptoms aggravated by cold and damp conditions
temporary relief with warmth and gentle stretching
periodic worsening of symptoms at night or early morning
